A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It's a giant middle finger to  Star Wars fans. This trilogy is effectively ruined by an egotistical writer/director who thinks he know the universe better than anyone.

Plot holes galore. Boring sub-plots. And if you had questions about who Snoke is\, or who's Rey's parents might be - the answers are not there or are utterly disappointing. 

It feels like Johnson took all the good work of Abrams from Force Awakens and took a lightsaber to it\, leaving the Saga in tatters.

There is no coming back from this for the series.
